question: Where were you born? Can you describe what your childhood was like?
What did your parents do for a living? What kind of influence did they have on you?
Did you have siblings? What was your relationship like with them growing up?
What were your hobbies or interests when you were a teenager?
Which schools did you attend? Can you walk me through your academic journey?
What subjects or fields interested you the most? Did you participate in any extracurricular activities?
How did you decide on your career path? What was your first job like?
Can you describe a typical workday in your current or most recent job?
Who are your closest friends? How did you meet them?
Do you participate in any community, social, or volunteer activities?
Can you tell me about your family life now? Are you married? Do you have children?
What do you usually do on weekends or holidays?
Can you describe your daily routine during a normal week?
Have you traveled recently for work or personal reasons? Where and why?
Are you a member of any organizations, clubs, or online communities?
Who do you usually meet with in your professional and personal life?
